website_summaries.verdict: Shoes may look simple, but they provide great traction on artificial indoor surfaces.
pros: Rubber sole provides a good grip on indoor playing surfaces
Low-top cut on the soccer shoes provides good freedom of movement
Good comfort and handling for a quick indoor game
Good durability for a full season of play
Trusted brand name for soccer shoes
cons: Will take a bit of time to break in these shoes

customer_reviews.title: Still Near or at the Top of the List
customer_reviews.text: Not really much that you can say about Sambas - they are a classic for a reason. These are not the original styling but an updated version. The real difference is in the soles; it's a different pattern than the originals. I actually got these for my son for ANW/parkour training because they have a relatively low heel and good grip on lots of surfaces. Add in the fact that even after like 57 or so years of existence that they just look cool as hell and you have a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy purchase but lack of sizing details
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and classic style of this shoe. I ordered it according to the sizing for my 10 year old son and it was surprisingly tight for his wide feet. I now know that Adidas shoes will probably always be too narrow for him. I wish the sizing had clarity for width. It was easy to order. Unfortunately I had to pay for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkins Fan

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Overall shoe and quality seems great. I bought these for my 6 year old for indoor soccer this summer. (He's worn nothing but adidas soccer shoes for the last 2 years ) I ordered a half size larger so he would have room to grow. These shoes didn't fit at all. They were more like an entire size too big and so narrow that once he put them on had to take them right back off because they hurt so bad and we're squishing his feet. Not really sure why these indoor soccer shoes are so different in fit than any others adidias makes. Very disappointing. Had to buy a pair of nikes this season instead.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull, but not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Not for wide feet . It's a beautiful shoe, comfortable for the kids, and greatly made, but it does come VERY narrow on the arch. My son has wide feet and I order one and a half size up!, ( I already had these for my other son and he is a normal feet and ordered only half size up)
customer_reviews.author: Belper

customer_reviews.title: Tough, comfortable and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying Addidas Sambas for our sone since he could walk and he’s now 11!! What I love about them is that he never complains about how they feel or his feet hurting. Also he is a very active kid and prefers to wear only one pair of shoes for everything. He attends catholic school so these look nice with his uniform pants or shorts. He grows out of these before he wears them out which is rarely true of any sport shoe we buy him. You won’t regret your purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Bohnenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are my enemy. My son is required to wear them for soccer. They are impossible to get on and they hurt his feet. The leng is correct for his size, but they are too narrow. So if I go up for the width, they’re too long.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Scott

customer_reviews.title: Timeless and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are my son’s fourth pair of Sambas and second pair of Millenniums. If it weren’t for the fact that he outgrows them, he would probably still be wearing his first pair - they are that sturdy. He wears them for school, indoor soccer practice, training, etc. Timeless style; looks good with jeans, schoolwear. I wear them, too. On my seventh pair (over thirty-odd years).
customer_reviews.author: Dermot Trellis

customer_reviews.title: Very durable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: High quality shoes, they last and last. Great for kids that tend to wear down soles of their shoes. Con: the shoes run a half size larger than expected. And they are rather stiff and require breaking in. Not all kids will be comfortable with the narrow heel and be patient with the break-in process.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynne Friters

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Overall poor quality. My son has been wearing these for less then a week and the white on the rubber sole has started to rub off. The laces have shredded on both shoes. They look great right out of box but not worth the hassle of now finding new shoes. I definitely will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Shoe lace comes undone easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 11 for my son. Seemed like there was still a lot of room and did not fit as expected. I'd go a half size smaller if possible. Great sturdy shoes. Shoe lace does come undone easily even though I tied it tightly. We will be replacing the shoe lace with lock laces.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon mama

customer_reviews.title: Order exact size.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these shoes. I do too, reminds me of my childhood. I'm going to order some in my size for old times. I tried ordering a size up for growth but they were to big. I recommend just getting the exact size.
customer_reviews.author: Kates_essential_life

customer_reviews.title: Fear the power of the Samba
customer_reviews.text: Guaranteed to make your kid run faster and jump higher. After giving my son these new kicks he was instantly elevated to new heights of soccer playing. The envy of all his friends, these shoes have mystical powers far beyond what we know.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Grindley

customer_reviews.title: Great for energetic boys! (Is that redundant?)
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome quality!! My 5 year old son goes through a pair of Toms in like 2 months and usually every pair of shoes that I buy show wear within a couple of days. These are so sturdy and can really take a beating. I think I've found a new favorite brand.
customer_reviews.author: M Large

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the sneakers but finding a size that fits is tough with this style.
customer_reviews.text: Had to order several sizes to make sure they fit my boys' feet (I have twin 4-year olds that are big for their age - they also have wide and tall feet.) And the window to return items (I still have the paris that are too small) is too narrow. Took me three orders to actually get the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail C Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe - excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes baby! Good looks, solid construction, if not slightly large, though that may be just a slight difference in shoe style as well. My kid loves these and I'm honestly sad I cant get this style in a daddy-size!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Great kids version of tge classic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great kids version of tge classic shoe. Perfect shoes for my active 4 yo. Soft, flexible and can go from preschool to soccer or playground. Sambas run a little big. My son wears 12.5 sneakers but 11.5 Sambas so Id say order a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: bil

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are an excellant buy. They are easy to wash, never look dirty, and they match with everything. They really hold up to abuse. They are worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: sturdy shoe that looks classic on my soccer loving 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: sturdy shoe that looks classic on my soccer loving 6 year old son. Easy to clean, not easily tore up like Nike running shoes
customer_reviews.author: YRN & JT

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable however they do run a little larger than i ...
customer_reviews.text: they are comfortable however they do run a little larger than i expected. i have to wear thicker socks to make them fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Samba rocks!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome shoes! My son loves these and wore them for soccer and school everyday. Well made except one of the laces shredded somehow. I replaced the laces and their perfect again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves them,
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves them, and I've had them for a while now and have resisted the wear and tear of everyday life
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Not for busy kids!
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in no time! My son wore them to school for a little over a week and they had to be replaced. Not good for active 8-year-olds​!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: As an adult ... I've had these shoes before and I know once he wears them they will form to his foot. My son has really wide feet so, like most other shoes in this size, they fit a little tight for my son. If your kids have normal feet they should fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shep.

customer_reviews.title: He loves wearing his "daddy shoes" and they look great. The white accents of the Millennium style look ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Sambas exclusively since I was a kid and was thrilled to find these for my son. He loves wearing his "daddy shoes" and they look great. The white accents of the Millennium style look very sharp and I expect to continue purchasing these for my son as he grows.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Buy one size bigger. I have bought 2 pairs ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy one size bigger. I have bought 2 pairs of this shoes to my son but you have to buy one size more because it fit smaller than other shes. Very resistant shoe
customer_reviews.author: MONOVA

customer_reviews.title: They are great, other than the shoelaces are constantly coming undone
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his sambas, so we got my 4 year old some. They are great, other than the shoelaces are constantly coming undone. Even with double and triple knots. Had the same problem with my 12 year old's sambas as well a few years ago, so I reluctantly bought these shoes. Not sure why Adidas hasn't fixed the problem after all these years. Solved our dilemma by buying black shoelaces at Walmart. Just be prepared to constantly tie your little one's shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Busymama

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a pair of indoor soccer like shoes, and these are perfect. They fit nice, are comfortable, well made and he loves them. Hopefully they hold up well to a 9 year old, but only time will tell. They do run a tad pricey, but Santa was able to make it work as part of Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: wjg

customer_reviews.title: What i like about them is that they last a lot longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Is the second pair i get for my son. He loves them. What i like about them is that they last a lot longer than other shoes I purchase before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and my son love these shoes, and my son feels very confident with them at school and at soccer games!
customer_reviews.author: Dionysus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just like when I was a kid. They fit the same as the other shoes my son has.
customer_reviews.author: PonyChonies

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love Them, Mom Approved
customer_reviews.text: Always have to purchase the current size my children wear plus the next size up because these are their all time favorite shoes !
customer_reviews.author: Merely A Mom

customer_reviews.title: better for futsal
customer_reviews.text: Classic soccer shoes, better for futsal. Don’t work too well on turf. Great for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little tight, granted i have wide feet. I work on my feet on concrete 8 hours/day and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was needing a sz11 Nike and ordered these in a sz11. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Everything is awesome about these shoes for my eight year old son ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is awesome about these shoes for my eight year old son except that they need higher/more comfy arch support. I've had to put inserts into his shoes to compensate.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for a rough child
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes for a rough child. Our son has been burning through his shoes and these are awesome we are now on month 4! Thank you for the great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been buying these shoes for my son for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these shoes for my son for years. they are the only ones that he grows out of before they break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them but maybe order half a size down
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. Work well for his indoor soccer and parkour. A little bigger than other shoes of the same size
customer_reviews.author: polargirl0000

customer_reviews.title: Same Old Sambas!
customer_reviews.text: my son likes them but says they aren't as comfortable as his other sneakers. As some who's worn Sambas before I understand that he also just needs to break them in. They are IMPOSSIBLE to keep tied though!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fitting

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying Adidas sneakers for our son for his entire walking life. They are incredibly durable and take quite the beating. They match well with just about everything he wears. This version of the Samba is excellent. Highly recommend this high quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Marq

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard to find shoes that are made of plastic these days--and ones that aren't wild colors. I have a son who doesn't like flashy colors as much, so the simple design is appreciated. Decently made leather shoes that seem like they will last for a kid that wears them every day--and if they are made as well as the last sambas we bought, that shouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: B. Welsh

customer_reviews.title: + My son loves those, this is his second ...
customer_reviews.text: + My son loves those, this is his second pair and he wants to wear them all the time, school, training, outside. - Somewhat very classic (not modern at all)
customer_reviews.author: Ciprian

customer_reviews.title: These shoes seem like really great quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem like really great quality. They are a tad bit narrow. They over all seem really comfortable and my son seems happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: These shoe's are certainly durable and we'll made. They do run a little large.I ordered a Size smaller and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and excellent for indoor soccer games or everyday wear. We have definetly got our monies worth with these shoes! Lots of wear and tear but the shoe still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Adorable; runs large IMO
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my little soccer player. I found them to run quite a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: goal13keep

customer_reviews.title: best kids shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: adidas sambas run 1/2 size big. Everything else is self explanatory...best kids shoe ever.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive shoe, not much grip and can be somewhat slidy on smooth surfaces. My son loves them and says they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dawnie

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor soccer!
customer_reviews.text: Size 5 fits my son (9 years old) exactly as expected, he has been really enjoying them during his indoor soccer games. Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: catgal77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes held up great for 5yr old. Easy to keep clean.

customer_reviews.title: I love Adidas so I had to get some for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Adidas so I had to get some for my son. I got the black and the white and they look awesome!

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for my 8 year old daughter to use for her indoor soccer games & Futsol too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheun

customer_reviews.title: Shoe was not sent in authentic addidas box. Shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was not sent in authentic addidas box. Shoe quality is somewhat questionsble. Specifically, the white bottom part of the shoe is already comming off after a few days of wear. I did not have this problem with similar pairs of shoes purchased from addidas directly.
customer_reviews.author: Boris Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: These work great with my sons ankle-foot orthotic braces
customer_reviews.text: These work great with my sons ankle-foot orthotic braces. These really hold up and provide a light, snug fit!

customer_reviews.title: great shoe, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: they were purchased for teenage girl... Absolutely loves them, she had to buy a whole size down to fit.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for my son. His last pair last 10 months. The first shoe he's ever owned that he outgrew before the shoes fell apart!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 5 year old son. He loves them!! He wears them to soccer and to school because he likes them so much.

customer_reviews.title: One of my FAVORITE boys shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I was unsure what shoes to get for my son for school this year. He loves playing soccer at recess so I thought I'd try these. They are perfect. Look great and he loves to wear them. Fit true to size. May just be these in a bigger size every year.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Laces out
customer_reviews.text: Love these and they go with everything! Size is perfect. The shoe laces were a little short. I did replace them. Other than that, perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Good grip for futsal
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Good grip on shoes for futsal on a wooden floor.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect tough shoes for our son
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect tough shoes for our son. He goes through cheaper shoes very quickly and I think these will last a long time due to better quality.

customer_reviews.text: These shoes hold up better than any other shoe I have ever purchased for my boys. They grow out of them before they need to be replaced.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, they fit great. The laces are way too short so you can't use all of the holes. Buying longer laces.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kid wears the heck out of them. Quality shoes that last

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Kids' Samba M K Indoor Soccer Cleat
product_meta.description:
You have to be fast if you want to own the indoor arena. The samba has dominated indoor Soccer for decades. These shoes have a soft, full grain leather upper for great touch and a lightweight eva midsole for better response on indoor surfaces.

The evolution of the classic, world-famous Samba for indoor play. Features a soft leather upper and comfortable gum rubber outsole.

adidas is a name that stands for excellence in all sectors of sport around the globe. The vision of company founder Adolf Dassler has become a reality, and his corporate philosophy has been the guiding principle for successor generations. The idea was as

See more
